summary: This bill, the Affordable PLUS Repayment Options for Parents Act of 2025, amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to allow borrowers of Parent PLUS loans or loans under section 428B (made on behalf of a dependent student) to repay these loans through income-contingent or income-based repayment plans. The bill removes existing restrictions preventing such borrowers from accessing these repayment options, clarifying the terms and conditions. The Act addresses how income is calculated in regards to repayments and specifies effective dates for implementation.
